00032 RainbruRPG::Options::OptionAttribute::OptionAttribute(tOptionAttributeType t){
00033   this->setType(t);
00034   tooltip="";
00035   widget=NULL;
00036 }

00047 void RainbruRPG::Options::OptionAttribute::setType(tOptionAttributeType t){
00048   if (t==OAT_UNKNOWN)
00049     LOGW("Setting a unknown type to an OptionAttribute");
00050 
00051   this->type=t;
00052 }

00063 RainbruRPG::Options::OptionAttribute::getType(){

00065   return this->type;
00066 }

00078 void RainbruRPG::Options::OptionAttribute::setName(const char*n){
00079   if (strlen(n)==0)
00080     LOGW("Setting an empty name to an OptionAttribute");
00081   this->name=n;
00082 }

00090   this->tooltip=t;
00091 }
